scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:dashboard" "npm run dev:userpage"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:userpage
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shared && npm install && cd ../dashboard && npm install && cd ../userPage && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules shared/node_modules dashboard/node_modules userPage/node_modules shared/dist dashboard/dist userPage/dist
